articles.description: Tata Group is in advanced talks with Pegatron to form a partnership for the iPhone assembly plant in Tamil Nadu. The plant will be Tata's second facility in India and the joint venture with Pegatron will help speed up manufacturing plans. Pegatron will provid…
articles.content: Tata Group is in advanced talks with Taiwan's Pegatron to form a partnership to run an iPhone assembly plant the Indian company is building in the southern state of Tamil Nadu, two sources with direc… [+2209 chars]
